name.baseName: Basin Modeling;Source rock and crude oil samples;Rock–Eval pyrolysis, GC/GC–MS, vitrinite reflectance measurements, and basin modeling
盆地模拟 ; 烃源岩和原油样品 ; 岩石评估热解、GC/GC-MS、镜质体反射率测量和盆地模拟

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Evaluate pyrolysis of rocks by GC/GC-MS, vitrinite reflectivity measurement and basin simulation
对岩石评估热解、通过GC/GC-MS、镜质体反射率测量和盆地模拟

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: using analytical techniques such as Rock–Eval pyrolysis, GC/GC–MS, vitrinite reflectance measurements, and basin modeling
使用分析技术，如岩石评估热解、GC/GC-MS、镜质体反射率测量和盆地模拟
technology.technologicalApplicability: The technical usage of the described industrial process involves characterizing the oil and gas generation potential of source rocks and crude oil samples. Specifically, it is used for the evaluation of hydrocarbon potential and maturity levels in formations by employing methods like Rock–Eval pyrolysis, Gas Chromatography/Gas Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry (GC/GC-MS), vitrinite reflectance measurements, and basin modeling. This type of analysis is crucial for the petroleum industry to guide exploration and evaluate the feasibility of resource extraction.
所描述的工业流程的技术应用涉及评估源岩和原油样本的油气生成潜力。具体来说，它用于通过岩石评估热解、气相色谱/气相色谱-质谱联用（GC/GC-MS）、镜质体反射率测量和盆地模拟等方法评价地层中的烃源潜力和成熟度水平。这类分析对于石油行业指导勘探和评估资源提取的可行性至关重要。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Results indicate that the Upper Cretaceous (Donga and Yogou formations) and the Eocene Sokor-1 Formation have oil and gas generation potential with II/III and III type kerogens.
结果表明，上白垩统（Donga组和Yogou组）和始新世Sokor-1组具有II/III型和III型干酪根的油气生成潜力。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Moussa, H. A., Bohari, A. D., Ahmed, K. S. & Harouna, M. Thermal maturity evolution and hydrocarbon generation in the Dibeilla oil field, Termit Basin, Eastern Niger: an organic geochemical and basin modeling approach. Arab J Geosci 16, 338 (2023).

Moussa, H. A., Bohari, A. D., Ahmed, K. S. & Harouna, M. Thermal maturity evolution and hydrocarbon generation in the Dibeilla oil field, Termit Basin, Eastern Niger: an organic geochemical and basin modeling approach. Arab J Geosci 16, 338 (2023).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When using this data set within the context of a Life Cycle Assessment, it is advised to consider the precise geological context and time of sample collection as these factors can significantly impact analytical results. Additionally, it is crucial to account for methodological consistency when comparing data from different regions or periods. The inclusion of uncertainties in measurements and the representativeness of samples for larger formations should be clearly documented. Users should also be aware of the technological applicability and limitations of the analytical techniques, ensuring appropriate extrapolation and interpretation of data.
在生命周期评估的背景下使用此数据集时，建议考虑样品采集的具体地质背景和时间，因为这些因素可能会显著影响分析结果。此外，在比较不同地区或时期的数据时，保持方法论的一致性至关重要。测量中的不确定性以及样品对更大地层的代表性应清晰记录。用户还应了解分析技术的技术适用性和限制，确保数据的适当外推和解释。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: The original text did not distinguish between Bio and Fossil. According to experts, this is Bio. The (S2) value range of Sokor-2 sample is 12.16-49.25 milligrams of hydrocarbons per gram of rock
原文未区分bio和fossil，根据专家判断此处为bio。Sokor-2样品的（S2）值范围为12.16-49.25毫克碳氢化合物/克岩石
